overview:
I deliver solutions. Big solutions. Systems of all sorts intrigue me. I love it when systems are humming smoothly, when people are communicating, when processes are unimpeded, when tools are enabling. That’s when products hit the market quickly and feedback rolls in effortlessly. That’s when you know you’re on to something huge.

I advise zero-stage to early-stage initiatives. I focus mainly on advising founders in need of technical guidance and/or looking to build out their teams. Unlike many out there, my advice comes with no strings attached. After all, they’re your strings, you should decide who to attach them to, how to attach them, and when.

So shoot me a note and we’ll talk about the thorn in your side. The one that’s been keeping you up at night, every night. We’ll devise a strategy for solving it, right there at the table. We’ll get the people talking, get the process flowing, get the tool helping. We’ll get the system humming. Now wouldn’t that be great?

relationships.title: Manager / Core Services / Cloud Applications and Services
